t: Luke 17
Jesus Warns of Offenses
Then*p He said to the disciples, “It*r is*r impossible*r that*r no*r offenses*r should*r come,*r but*r woe*r to*ir him*ir through*r whom*r they*r do*r come!*r

It*r would*r be*r better*r for*r him*r if*r a*r millstone*r were*r hung*r around*r his*r neck,*r and*r he*r were*r thrown*r into*r the*r sea,*r than*r that*r he*r should*r offend*r one*r of*r these*r little*r ones.*r
Take*r heed*r to*r yourselves.*r If*r your*r brother*r sins*r against*r you,*r rebuke*r him;*r and*r if*r he*r repents,*r forgive*r him.*r
And*r if*r he*r sins*r against*r you*r seven*r times*r in*r a*r day,*r and*r seven*r times*r in*r a*r day*r returns*r to*r you,*r saying,*r ‘I*r repent,’*r you*r shall*r forgive*r him.”*r
Faith and Duty
And*p the apostles said to the Lord, “Increase our faith.”

So*p the Lord said, “If*r you*r have*r faith*r as*r a*r mustard*r seed,*r you*r can*r say*r to*r this*r mulberry*r tree,*r ‘Be*r pulled*r up*r by*r the*r roots*r and*r be*r planted*r in*r the*r sea,’*r and*r it*r would*r obey*r you.*r

And*r which*r of*r you,*r having*r a*r servant*r plowing*r or*r tending*r sheep,*r will*r say*r to*r him*r when*r he*r has*r come*r in*r from*r the*r field,*r ‘Come*r at*r once*r and*r sit*r down*r to*r eat’?*r

But*r will*r he*r not*r rather*r say*r to*r him,*r ‘Prepare*r something*r for*r my*r supper,*r and*r gird*r yourself*r and*r serve*r me*r till*r I*r have*r eaten*r and*r drunk,*r and*r afterward*r you*r will*r eat*r and*r drink’?*r
Does*r he*r thank*r that*r servant*r because*r he*r did*r the*r things*r that*r were*r commanded*r him?*r I*r think*r not.*r

So*r likewise*r you,*r when*r you*r have*r done*r all*r those*r things*r which*r you*r are*r commanded,*r say,*r ‘We*r are*r unprofitable*r servants.*r We*r have*r done*r what*r was*r our*r duty*r to*r do.’”*r
Ten Lepers Cleansed
Now*p it happened as He went to Jerusalem that He passed through the midst of Samaria and Galilee.
Then as He entered a certain village, there met Him ten men who were lepers, who stood afar off.
And they lifted up their*i voices and said, “Jesus, Master, have mercy on us!”
So*p when He saw them,*i He said to them, “Go,*r show*r yourselves*r to*r the*r priests.”*r And so it was that as they went, they were cleansed.
And*p one of them, when he saw that he was healed, returned, and with a loud voice glorified God,
and fell down on his*i face at His feet, giving Him thanks. And he was a Samaritan.
So*p Jesus answered and said, “Were*r there*r not*r ten*r cleansed?*r But*r where*r are*ir the*r nine?*r
Were*r there*r not*r any*r found*r who*r returned*r to*r give*r glory*r to*r God*r except*r this*r foreigner?”*r
And He said to him, “Arise,*r go*r your*r way.*r Your*r faith*r has*r made*r you*r well.”*r
The Coming of the Kingdom
Now*p when He was asked by the Pharisees when the kingdom of God would come, He answered them and said, “The*r kingdom*r of*r God*r does*r not*r come*r with*r observation;*r
nor*r will*r they*r say,*r ‘See*r here!’*r or*r ‘See*r there!’*r For*r indeed,*r the*r kingdom*r of*r God*r is*r within*r you.”*r
Then*p He said to the disciples, “The*r days*r will*r come*r when*r you*r will*r desire*r to*r see*r one*r of*r the*r days*r of*r the*r Son*r of*r Man,*r and*r you*r will*r not*r see*r it.*ir
And*r they*r will*r say*r to*r you,*r ‘Look*r here!’*r or*r ‘Look*r there!’*r Do*r not*r go*r after*r them*ir or*r follow*r them.*ir

For*r as*r the*r lightning*r that*r flashes*r out*r of*r one*r part*ir under*r heaven*r shines*r to*r the*r other*r part*ir under*r heaven,*r so*r also*r the*r Son*r of*r Man*r will*r be*r in*r His*r day.*r
But*r first*r He*r must*r suffer*r many*r things*r and*r be*r rejected*r by*r this*r generation.*r
And*r as*r it*r was*r in*r the*r days*r of*r Noah,*r so*r it*r will*r be*r also*r in*r the*r days*r of*r the*r Son*r of*r Man:*r

They*r ate,*r they*r drank,*r they*r married*r wives,*r they*r were*r given*r in*r marriage,*r until*r the*r day*r that*r Noah*r entered*r the*r ark,*r and*r the*r flood*r came*r and*r destroyed*r them*r all.*r
Likewise*r as*r it*r was*r also*r in*r the*r days*r of*r Lot:*r They*r ate,*r they*r drank,*r they*r bought,*r they*r sold,*r they*r planted,*r they*r built;*r
but*r on*r the*r day*r that*r Lot*r went*r out*r of*r Sodom*r it*r rained*r fire*r and*r brimstone*r from*r heaven*r and*r destroyed*r them*ir all.*r
Even*r so*r will*r it*r be*r in*r the*r day*r when*r the*r Son*r of*r Man*r is*r revealed.*r

“In*rp that*r day,*r he*r who*r is*r on*r the*r housetop,*r and*r his*r goods*r are*ir in*r the*r house,*r let*r him*r not*r come*r down*r to*r take*r them*r away.*r And*r likewise*r the*r one*r who*r is*r in*r the*r field,*r let*r him*r not*r turn*r back.*r
Remember*r Lot’s*r wife.*r
Whoever*r seeks*r to*r save*r his*r life*r will*r lose*r it,*r and*r whoever*r loses*r his*r life*r will*r preserve*r it.*r
I*r tell*r you,*r in*r that*r night*r there*r will*r be*r two*r men*ir in*r one*r bed:*r the*r one*r will*r be*r taken*r and*r the*r other*r will*r be*r left.*r
Two*r women*ir will*r be*r grinding*r together:*r the*r one*r will*r be*r taken*r and*r the*r other*r left.*r
Two*r men*ir will*r be*r in*r the*r field:*r the*r one*r will*r be*r taken*r and*r the*r other*r left.”*r
And*p they answered and said to Him, “Where, Lord?” So*p He said to them, “Wherever*r the*r body*r is,*r there*r the*r eagles*r will*r be*r gathered*r together.”*r
